neighbors.name: New Sunshine Fund LLC
neighbors.claims: New Sunshine Fund LLC is linked to an energy investment initiative that focuses on utility-scale solar and battery storage projects [Sunshine Fund — other, retrieved 2026-02-12; "We invest in utility-scale solar and battery storage"](https://www.sunshine.fund). In mid-2022, Walton Global sold approximately 277 acres in Eloy’s Sunshine Industrial Park to an undisclosed buyer for a major development (the purchasing company’s identity was withheld for market reasons) [Walton Global — news, 2022-07-15; "company that purchased the land was not announced"](https://walton.com/walton-global-sells-land-in-sunshine-industrial-park/). The site was described as “prime real estate” with access to two interstates and a Union Pacific rail line, intended to attract businesses and jobs to the area [Walton Global — news, 2022-07-15; "prime real estate, with access to two major interstates"](https://walton.com/walton-global-sells-land-in-sunshine-industrial-park/). The fund’s beneficial ownership and decision-makers have not been publicly disclosed, reflecting a deliberately low profile during the land acquisition [Walton Global — news, 2022-07-15; "purchased the land was not announced"](https://walton.com/walton-global-sells-land-in-sunshine-industrial-park/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Controls a large strategic land parcel; significant capital for development but no established local ties or public presence

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the fund’s representatives (via listed contacts or local officials) to discuss mutual benefits; explore partnering or co-development to avoid competition, highlighting how collaboration can advance both parties’ goals

neighbors.name: Blue Beacon International Inc
neighbors.claims: Blue Beacon International, Inc. was incorporated in Oklahoma on November 7, 1979, and is a privately held truck wash corporation headquartered in Salina, Kansas [B2BHint — other, retrieved 2026-02-12; "Oklahoma (United States) • 07 Nov 1979"](https://b2bhint.com/en/company/us-ok/blue-beacon-international-incorporated--2300342387). It registered as a foreign corporation in Arizona on June 25, 1982 (Arizona File F00284892) [BusinessProfiles — other, retrieved 2026-02-12; "was formed on 1982-06-25 in Arizona"](https://businessprofiles.com/details/blue-beacon-international-incorporated/AZ-F00284892). The company’s leadership includes President Trace E. Walker and Director Michael B. Walker [BusinessProfiles — other, retrieved 2026-02-12; "TRACE E WALKER president"](https://businessprofiles.com/details/blue-beacon-international-incorporated/AZ-F00284892). Blue Beacon owns and operates a truck wash at 1172 S. Sunshine Blvd in Eloy (I-10 interchange), on the parcels adjacent to the project site [Blue Beacon — company site, retrieved 2026-02-12; "1172 S Sunshine Blvd, Eloy, AZ"](https://bluebeacon.com/locations). The firm has no known involvement in local land-use disputes and typically focuses solely on its commercial operations.
neighbors.influence_justification: Small business presence; out-of-state ownership with minimal local economic or political influence

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate with the local Blue Beacon manager to address any construction or traffic concerns; keep communication open to ensure the project does not impede their access or operations, which should prevent any opposition from this neighbor

overview_summary: Both neighboring landowners are non-local corporations. New Sunshine Fund LLC appears to be a renewable energy investment entity that recently bought a large tract of industrial land in Eloy, indicating potential plans for a major energy project or land speculation. Blue Beacon International, Inc. is a Kansas-based truck wash chain operating at the I-10/Sunshine Blvd interchange; it has a limited local presence and is unlikely to actively oppose new development.
